title: Domestic PV wholesales dip 2.3% at 3,41,510 units in July: SIAM
description: Passenger vehicle wholesales in India fell 2.3% year-on-year to 3,41,510 units in July, while two-wheeler sales grew 12.5% to 14,41,694 units. Three-wheeler wholesales also increased by 5.1% to 59,073 units, according to the Society of Indian Automobile Manufacturers (SIAM).
